articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: mobility.science
articles.contents:
Human mobility describes physical patterns of movement of people
within a spatial system. Many of these patterns, including daily
commuting, are cyclic and quantifiable. These patterns capture physical
phenomena tied to processes studied in epidemiology, and other social,
behavioral, and economic sciences. This site captures and documents
advancements in this area with emphasis on statistical and computational
methods and tools.
